body.p: Dear Sir the Petition of the man, that I spoke to you about at the Phenix Hotell In Lex -- is forwarded to the governor -- please ^use^ Your Influence to have him Released as soon as possible, for he is needed In this Neighborhood at this time -- If the governer should do anything for him, forward the papers to Bryan Allen Lex Ky -- please attend to this matter strictly & much Obligers Your friend
